title: Im Patching and repairing files, pls dont give me a queue :/
body: i am currently in the launching screen repairing files after my game bugsplat twice and I may get a 20 minute queue so pls help :/

replies.body:
Bug splat errors can be due to corrupt game files causing the game to not render properly.  The patcher is now scanning your game files to repair any bad files, which is a good thing.  

You can also check out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide to go over steps towards tuning-up your software and drivers to make sure everything is covered.  Make sure to allow the patcher to continue repairing as closing it could restart the process or leave you with corrupt files.  Thanks for your patience!
It's happening to me too. Like Riot what the heck is going on. I thought you sent out a fix?
